game.name: Sword World VR
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, VR 전용, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Colosseum Mode: 1vN battles vs hordes. VR lets you sword-strike weak points or blunt-stun/knockback. Motion skills add immersion: slash/jab to trigger. Loot gear to boost stats and alter combat—weapons change attacks . Gear up and slash through crowds in this fast VR brawler.

Loot gear to boost stats and alter combat—weapons change attacks . Gear up and slash through crowds in this fast VR brawler.
